remarks: The least upper bound property of subgroup sum.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lsmub1.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
lsmlub $p |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( ( S C_ U /\ T C_ U ) <-> ( S .(+) T ) C_ U ) ) $.
